modules.title: Band gap by four probe method

summary: Semiconductor Physics Lab is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 9 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Practical Physics – K. G. Mazumder & B. Ghosh
Advanced Practical Physics – D. Chattopadhyay & P. C. Rakshit
B.Sc. Practical Physics – C. L. Arora
course_outcomes: Interpret I–V characteristics of p-n and Zener diodes and evaluate d.c and a.c resistances.
Estimate performance of Zener diode through load and line regulation and design regulators.
Measure voltage across capacitor and resistor, determine resonant frequency and Q-factor of LCR circuit.
Categorize optical fiber using numerical aperture and attenuation.
Measure and explain band-gap and carrier concentration of a semiconductor.
prerequisites: Knowledge of graphical presentation with proper choice of unit.
